fields.Title: YARD / HANGED MAN BOOTS
fields.Description: If Kim is not there, you can take off the boots once the body is down.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "It feels like the leg is going to c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It feels like the leg is going to come off along with the boot, but you are able to get the boot to move a centimetre or two.

fields.Title: Ice Bear Fridge: "Whatever you're planning to do, you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Whatever you're planning to do, you need to do it before you catch pneumonia in the cold draft coming from deep inside the fridge.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "Something cracks in the left leg --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Something cracks in the left leg -- it really is about to come off. The leg, I mean. Not the boot.

fields.Title: Cunoesse: ""Look -- he's skinning the fucker u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Look -- he's skinning the fucker up good. *Puukko* style."

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "Before you can grab hold of the boo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Before you can grab hold of the boot, you hear a voice coming out of the dead man's mouth. It's the voice of Lieutenant Kim Kitsuragi, telling you to stop whatever you're doing.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Whoah. Cuno's little *sneak-pig's*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Whoah. Cuno's little *sneak-pig's* back for the booty... "

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "It's heavier than you'd think. You'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's heavier than you'd think. You're forced to drop it back down immediately. The corpse lands on the ground with a nauseating thud, looking even sadder than before.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I thought we decided to leave it t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I thought we decided to leave it to Processing." The lieutenant shakes his head. "Let's not turn this into some kind of circus."

fields.Title: You: "Take stock of the damage."
fields.Dialogue Text: Take stock of the damage.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Damn, you're out of shape... In you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Damn, you're out of shape... In your defence, the corpse *was* quite slippery.

fields.Title: Perception (Smell): "Yes. These absolutely need to be wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. These absolutely need to be washed before. The stink is incredible.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The body is reluctant to let go of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The body is reluctant to let go of the boots -- as though they were its last bit of dignity.

fields.Title: You: "Step on the corpse as you pull on t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Step on the corpse as you pull on the boots.

fields.Title: Empathy: "See? The corpse doesn't care if you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: See? The corpse doesn't care if you try to take his boots. He doesn't need them. He's probably *glad* to get rid of them.

fields.Title: You: "Pick up the body and try to shake t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Pick up the body and try to shake the boots off.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "Not good. Let's pin this on the bea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Not good. Let's pin this on the bear -- the ice bear tore up his legs with its claws. As for the boots -- you can't possibly do anything with them until you have cleaned and *disinfected* them thoroughly.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "You may want to slow down. Don't te..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You may want to slow down. Don't tear into it like that.

fields.Title: Jump to: [ICE BEAR FRIDGE MAIN HUB]
You: "Pull on the right boot."
fields.Dialogue Text: Pull on the right boot.

fields.Title: Logic: "Okay, so you can *sneak* out of you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay, so you can *sneak* out of your room maybe, after he's gone asleep...

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Didn't the Whirling have a kitchen?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Didn't the Whirling have a kitchen?

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Is that an accusatory glance he gav..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Is that an accusatory glance he gave you? No... no, he's cool.

fields.Title: Jump to: [ICE BEAR FRIDGE MAIN HUB]
Interfacing: "Damn it, this is turning into some..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Damn it, this is turning into some sort of mega-puzzle.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "It's not completely useless. You're..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not completely useless. You're able to reveal a little more of the putrid polymer sock beneath the boot.

fields.Title: You: "Try to twist the boots off one by o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Try to twist the boots off one by one.

fields.Title: Jump to: [ICE BEAR FRIDGE MAIN HUB]
Cunoesse: ""Yeah, fuck it to pieces for us. Li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, fuck it to pieces for us. Liar cop!"

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Just relax. This is easy. This is *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just relax. This is easy. This is *happening*.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "You're sabotaging the crime scene,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're sabotaging the crime scene, and yet you haven't even finished the field autopsy. Come back later when you're done with the investigation.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Didn't the Whirling have a kitchen?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Didn't the Whirling have a kitchen?

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Hell. Keep at it, pig!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hell. Keep at it, pig!"

fields.Title: You: "Adjust his seating position first."
fields.Dialogue Text: Adjust his seating position first.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "You're going to need to summon all..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're going to need to summon all your strength for this undertaking.

fields.Title: You: "Pull on the left boot."
fields.Dialogue Text: Pull on the left boot.

fields.Title: Perception (Smell): "Yes. These absolutely need to be wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. These absolutely need to be washed before. The stink is incredible.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "This is the right method. It takes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is the right method. It takes some time, but eventually the boots come off -- with nasty slices of polymer sock stuck to even bigger pieces of skin and rotting flesh.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "He's too heavy to move by yourself..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's too heavy to move by yourself -- a great mass of dead muscles, with hoarfrost covering his milky eyes.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The legs look like they've been cla..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The legs look like they've been clawed at by wild animals. As for the boots -- you can't possibly do anything with them until you have cleaned and *disinfected* them thoroughly.
